experience._note: Bullet 1: Responsibility/What you did | Bullet 2-3: Metrics & Impact
experience.title: Full Stack Developer & Project Manager
bullets: Lead end-to-end development and project management for client web and mobile applications.
Reduced average project delivery time by streamlining CI/CD pipelines and sprint planning.
Managed a cross-functional team, consistently shipping features on schedule with zero critical bugs.

experience._note: Bullet 1: Responsibility/What you did | Bullet 2-3: Metrics & Impact
experience.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
bullets: Built and maintained features on the Kave Guild website and the Extragig mobile job-finding app.
Improved page load performance by 40% through code splitting and lazy-loading optimizations.
Shipped 12+ production features across web and mobile stacks during the internship.

projects.title: Dermacura
projects.description: Mobile app for dermatology care with telemedicine and AI-powered skin disease detection. Implemented a CNN model for preliminary skin-condition analysis.

projects.title: Truck-io Fleet Management
projects.description: GPS-enabled admin panel with live tracking and route optimization. Developed a React Native driver app with real-time alerts.
